record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1905, Champions of the West. Fourth row: William James Boone, Melville Archibald “Bubbles” Hill, Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), Fred Mitchell Walker, and Lester Lamont Larson; third row: H. B. Conibear, Gerry Williamson, Merrill C. Meigs, Edwin Eugene Parry, and Frederick Adolph Speik (assistant coach); second row: unidentified, Carl Huntley Hitchcock, Lewis Daniel Scherer, Clarence Russell, Jesse Claire Harper, and Arthur Hill Badenoch; first row: Leo Carter DeTray, Hugo Bezdek, Mark S. Catlin (captain), Walter Eckersall, and Burton Pike Gale.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
